title: The Monkey who would be king
brief_description: Real animals fill the roles in this adaptation of a fable for children. When the Lion abdicates, all the animals gather to see whom he chooses as successor. The Monkey snatches the crown, and is able to establish himself as ruler. Soon, though, he learns the cost of kingship.
